net.juniper.smgt.ssp.model
Interface PortalBehavior

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericPortalBehavior
public interface PortalBehavior

The portal behavior specifies the functionality of the "model" used to interface with a Service Activation Engine.

The implementation of this interface provides a thin wrapper of the remote interface of the Service Activation Engine. Although the interface is specified in the context of a Web Application, the model does not depend on any web application specific functionality. The same model implemenation can be used to create different applications.

login

public String login(String loginName,
                    String password,
                    boolean persistent)
             throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.LoginException,
                    net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException,
                    net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException,
                    net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.ServiceAuthenticationException,
                    net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Login user.

Create a user session for the specified user. Different portal behaviors will implement different functionality while logging in a user.

Parameters:
loginName - The name ther want to log in as.
password - The password used for authenticating the request.
persistent - If set, the login is made persistent.
Returns:
null if the login does not causes a switch in IP address, WAIT_FOR_TOKEN if the login causes a switch to a TOKEN address, WAIT_FOR_PUBLIC if the login causes a switch to a PUBLIC address.
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.LoginException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.ServiceAuthenticationException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

logout

public String logout(boolean unregister)
              throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException,
                     net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException,
                     net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Logout current user session

The current user session is terminated and replaced with an unauthenticated user session.

Parameters:
unregister - if true remove persistent login information
Returns:
null if the logout does not causes a switch in IP address, WAIT_FOR_TOKEN if the logout causes a switch to a TOKEN address, WAIT_FOR_PUBLIC if the logout causes a switch to a PUBLIC address.
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

registerEquipment

public void registerEquipment(String macAddress,
                              String loginName,
                              String password,
                              String description)
                       throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Register equipment.

When a Service Activation Engine receives a DHCP request from registered equipment, it sends the registered loginName and password to the router to authenticate a public IP address.

The identified equipment is registered without a check for router and interface. This use may impose an unacceptable security risk.

Parameters:
macAddress - The MAC address identifying the equipment.
loginName - Name used for authenticating IP address.
password - Password used for authenticating IP address.
description - Text describing the purpose of the registration
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

registerEquipment

public void registerEquipment(String macAddress,
                              String loginName,
                              String password,
                              String vrName,
                              String intfName,
                              String description)
                       throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Register equipment.

When a Service Activation Engine receives a DHCP request from registered equipment, it sends the registered loginName and password to the router to authenticate a public IP address.

The registration is only recognized, if the Service Activation Engine receives it from the registered virtual router and interface. If the DHCP request is received from a different VR or interface the equipment is treated as unregistered.

Parameters:
macAddress - The MAC address identifying the equipment.
loginName - Name used for authenticating IP address.
password - Password used for authenticating IP address.
vrName - Name of virtual router where the equipment is registered. If the name is "*", virtual router check is disabled.
intfName - Name of the interface where the equipment is registered. If the name is "*", the interface check is disabled.
description - Text describing the purpose of the registration
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

unregisterEquipment

public void unregisterEquipment(String macAddress)
                         throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Remove equipment registration.

The virtual router and interface are not checked before removing the registration.

Parameters:
macAddress - The MAC address identifying the equipment.
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

unregisterEquipment

public void unregisterEquipment(String macAddress,
                                String loginName,
                                String password)
                         throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Remove equipment registration.

Parameters:
macAddress - The MAC address identifying the equipment.
loginName - Name used for authenticating IP address. If the loginName is null or "", the credentials are not checked, otherwise they must match the credentials provided when registering the equipment.
password - Password used for authenticating IP address. If the password is null or "", the credentials are not checked, otherwise they must match the credentials provided when registering the equipment.
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

registerLogin

public void registerLogin(String loginName,
                          String password)
                   throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.LoginException,
                          net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Register login.

The provided loginName and password are persistently stored. The key to the store is the MAC address of the current user session. If the MAC address is not known (e.g. if the current session is not a DHCP session) an exception is thrown.

Parameters:
loginName - login name to register
password - password authenticating loginName
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.LoginException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

unregisterLogin

public void unregisterLogin()
                     throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.LoginException,
                            net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Remove login registration.

The login information stored based on the MAC address of the current user session is removed.

Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.LoginException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

registerNextLogin

public void registerNextLogin(String loginName,
                              String password)
                       throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.LoginException,
                              net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Register next login.

The provided loginName and password are temporarily stored while a DHCP IP address transition is in progress. If the current session is not a DHCP session an exception is thrown.

Parameters:
loginName - login name to register
password - password authenticating loginName
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.LoginException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

public Collection readSubscribedServices(String category)
                                  throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException,

net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException

readSubscribedServices

public Collection readSubscribedServices(String category,
                                         String additionalServiceFilter)
                                  throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException,
                                         net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException,
                                         net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException
Return collection of currently subscribed services.

The provided information can be used for the "services" page to display information about currently subscribed services.

Parameters:
category - Name of the service category to return. If the category is "*", all services are returned.
additionalServiceFilter - to be used to further restrict the colleciton of services. For example, the filter "(authenticationRequired=false)" means: filter out services that require authentication. A value of "" is acceptable and is treated as no additional service filter to be used. A value of null is NOT acceptable and results in runtime exception (NullPointerException).
Returns:
collection of Row objects. The column names in the returned Rows are the name of the Service and Subscription attributes prefixed with "service." and "subscription.". E.g. "service.serviceName", "subscription.active".
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

collection of Row objects. The column names in the returned Rows are the name of the Service attributes prefixed with "service." E.g. "service.serviceName",
Throws:

addScheduleEntry

public void addScheduleEntry(String id,
                             Row fromScheduledTime,
                             Row toScheduledTime,
                             Collection actionRows)
                      throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException,
                             net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException
Adds a Schedule Entry for the subscriber.

Parameters:
fromScheduledTime - The Scheduled Time from Time Spec provided as Row objects. A row includes various columns for the Time Specification. For example "idx", "year", "month", etc.
toScheduledTime - The Scheduled Time from Time Spec provided as Row objects. A row includes various columns for the Time Specification. For example "idx", "year", "month", etc.
actionRows - list of Row objects. A row includes three columns. They are "idx", "operation", and "serviceName.
Returns:
void
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException

setSessionTimeout

public void setSessionTimeout(int timeout)
                       throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException,
                              net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException,
                              net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Set User Session Timeout.

The current user session is deactivated when the specified time out expires. The session timeout counts from the start of the user session.

Parameters:
timeout - number of seconds until the user session expires.
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException

setActivationTrigger

public void setActivationTrigger(String subscriptionName,
                                 String activationTrigger)
                          throws net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException,
                                 net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException,
                                 net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownServiceException,
                                 net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownSubscriptionException,
                                 net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.ServiceAuthenticationException,
                                 net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEException
Modify the "Activation Trigger" of a subscription.

The activation trigger determines whether a subscription will be activated automatically when the user logs in, or must be activated manually through the portal.

Parameters:
subscriptionName - Name of the subscription to modify.
activationTrigger - either "MANUAL" or "ACTIVATE_ON_LOGIN"
Throws:
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.NonUniqueUserException
net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.UnknownServiceException
